R3RE8P
Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing

All codes for Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing require the use of the OSSleepthread hook

Load All-Star Power [Anarion]
C22305F0 00000005
3DE0804E 61EF95F2
A1EF0000 2C0FYYYY
4082000C 38000002
90030000 80030000
60000000 00000000
Loads without need for item.
Y=button to activate code.

Infinite All-Star Power [Anarion]
C222EA64 00000003
82442B44 92442B50
92442B54 80842B40
60000000 00000000

Instant Capsule Item [Anarion]
0421BBB4 3860000F

no laps toggle 1+2 [wiiztec]
284E9EF8 00000300
04139FF0 901E0074
CC000000 00000000
04139FF0 60000000
E0000000 80008000
laps don't count so you can race forever

P1-P3 Instant level 3 boost when drifting toggle P1 HOME [wiiztec]
C20C59EC 00000007
3E2080C0 5715801E
56B5843E 2C1518F8
40820008 90713488
2C1546B0 40820008
90713498 2C157468
40820008 907134A8
F0030168 00000000
284E9EF8 00008000
CC000000 00000000
48000000 80C03488
DE000000 80009340
34000168 3BA3D70A
14000168 40400000
E2000001 00000000
48000000 80C03498
DE000000 80009340
34000168 3BA3D70A
14000168 40400000
E2000001 00000000
48000000 80C034A8
DE000000 80009340
34000168 3BA3D70A
14000168 40400000
E0000000 80008000
on by default

P1-P3 infinite drift/stunt boost toggle P1 - [wiiztec]
C20C59EC 00000007
3E2080C0 5715801E
56B5843E 2C1518F8
40820008 90713488
2C1546B0 40820008
90713498 2C157468
40820008 907134A8
F0030168 00000000
284E9EF8 00001000
CC000000 00000000
48000000 80C03488
DE000000 80009340
14000190 00000000
E2000001 00000000
48000000 80C03498
DE000000 80009340
14000190 00000000
E2000001 00000000
48000000 80C034A8
DE000000 80009340
14000190 00000000
E0000000 80008000
boost lasts until you crash
on by default

player 1 codes

unlimited top speed toggle C+Z P1 [wiiztec]
284E9EF8 00006000
CC000000 00000000
2A4E9EF8 00000C00
48000000 80C02EE4
DE000000 80009340
120002A0 000F0000
E0000000 80008000
there is no limit to your speed when this code is enabled you just keep accelerating, doesn't work online
if you use nunchuk the two 2A4E9EF8 00000C00 lines will enable friction when drifting so you have more control
this might work for PAL also since some other codes did
on by default

item selection for nunchuk P1 [wiiztec]
04C0309C 00000000
284E9EF8 00000001
8000000A 11A9BC48
284E9EF9 00000008
8000000A 5F724DA9
284E9EF9 00000002
8000000A 3EBCDDED
284E9EF9 00000004
8000000A 26E96DA5
284E9EF9 00002001
8000000A D8AE59CB
284E9EF9 00002008
8000000A 0053F395
284E9EF9 00002002
8000000A 84917C21
284E9EF9 00002004
8000000A 0F6A6E94
284E9EF9 00004001
8000000A 9A67CB42
284E9EF9 00004002
8000000A 953D2512
284E9EF9 00004004
8000000A B678E022
2AC030B9 CFFF3000
8420000A 80C0309C
E0000000 80008000
when you select an item you will have an infinite amount of that item (except all star) until you select a different item
directions are directions of the wiimote dpad
left: triple red rockets
up: triple boxing gloves
right: triple bombs
down: triple sonic shoes
Z+left: horn
Z+up: star
Z+right: rainbow
Z+down: triple cone mines
C+left: purple remote rocket
C+right: shield
C+down: all star
item address and most item values found by Thomas83Lin, values for rainbows & triple cone mines found by me

item selection for classic controller P1 [wiiztec]
04C0309C 00000000
2871AAAA 00000002
8000000A 11A9BC48
2871AAAB 00000001
8000000A 5F724DA9
2871AAAB 00008000
8000000A 3EBCDDED
2871AAAB 00004000
8000000A 26E96DA5
2871AAAB 00002002
8000000A D8AE59CB
2871AAAB 00002001
8000000A 0053F395
2871AAAB 0000A000
8000000A 84917C21
2871AAAB 00006000
8000000A 0F6A6E94
2871AAAB 00000006
8000000A 9A67CB42
2871AAAB 00008004
8000000A 953D2512
2871AAAB 00004004
8000000A B678E022
2AC030B9 CFFF3000
8420000A 80C0309C
E0000000 80008000
when you select an item you will have an infinite amount of that item (except all star) until you select a different item
directions are directions of the CC dpad
left: triple red rockets
up: triple boxing gloves
right: triple bombs
down: triple sonic shoes
L+left: horn
L+up: star
L+right: rainbow
L+down: triple cone mines
ZR+left: purple remote rocket
ZR+right: shield
ZR+down: all star

14000168 40400000
E0000000 80008000
on by default
